qas.question: How many commercial airports are under construction in Saint Helena?
What is the only method of travel currently available to Saint Helena?
A large airfield is located on what portion of the island?
What kind of flights are offered to limited civilians?

context: Saint Helena is one of the most remote islands in the world, has one commercial airport under construction, and travel to the island is by <a1_0>ship<a1_0/> only. A large military airfield is located on <a2_0>Ascension Island<a2_0/>, with two Friday flights to RAF Brize Norton, England (as from September 20<a0_0>1<a0_0/>0). These <a3_0>RAF flights<a3_0/> offer a limited number of seats to civilians.
